document.full_text: rather than run in five or six races and retire to stud, paddy o'prado is taking the summer and fall off to nosh some of kentucky's finest bluegrass. then, he will be the subject of an equine form of "the bachelor."
document.title: the rail: for paddy o'prado, a time to heal
lines_and_colors: rather than run in five or six races and retire to stud, paddy o'prado is taking the summer and fall off to nosh some of kentucky's finest bluegrass. then, he will be the subject of an equine form of "the bachelor."
